name: YOU BOUND
description:
You Bound is another Jam entry of mine, I plan to make this game my annual project for the future YN jams (Unless, something happens and things change which, a lot can happen in a year!)  So that I can keep focusing on Motel Snooze!

This one certainly challenged me this time around, so it may seem a little small right now as again, I did run out of time while developing this.  But, I do hope you enjoy what's been made and thank you so much for giving it a play!
